info.name: Google Chrome Glossy Blue Scrollbars
info.description: As the name suggests, this redesigns scrollbars (and buttons, optionally) to look like Google Chrome's Glossy Blue theme. I made this as that's usually my theme and it makes them blend in!
info.additionalInfo: Optionally, buttons can be styled! This is disabled by default as websites like Google Maps and YouTube look weird with them modfied.

options.label: Yes
options.value: button { background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #e0eeff 0%,#b8cce4 20%,#6c89ad 80%,#4d617a 100%) !important; border: 1.25px solid #6c89ad; color: rgb(51,51,51); } button:active { background: linear-gradient(to top, #e0eeff 0%,#b8cce4 20%,#6c89ad 80%,#4d617a 100%) !important; }
